DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether lower blood homocysteine level treatment B vitamins prevent cardiovascular disease
DOC.detailed_description: Observational study demonstrate elevated level plasma total homocysteine risk factor cardiovascular disease . The purpose trial evaluate efficacy homocysteine lowering treatment B vitamins secondary prevention patient experience acute myocardial infarction . This control , double-blind , multi-centre trial include 3750 men woman age 30-85 experienced acute myocardial infarction within 7 day prior randomization . Participants randomize , two-by-two factorial design , receive one follow four treatment : A , folic acid 0.8 mg plus vitamin B12 0.4 mg vitamin B6 40 mg per day ; B , folic acid 0.8 mg plus vitamin B12 0.4 mg per day ; C , vitamin B6 40 mg per day ; D , placebo . The primary end point 3.5 year follow-up composite recurrent myocardial infarction stroke sudden death attribute coronary artery disease .
